articles.title: Stock futures nudge higher on Credit Suisse buyout - Reuters.com
articles.description: U.S. stock futures rose in Asian trade on Monday in relief at a weekend rescue deal for Credit Suisse, though the mood was nervous and financial shares remained under pressure from contagion fears, even with support from global central banks.
